document.full_text: fighting between rebels and forces loyal to muammar gaddafi is forcing thousands of refugees to flee western libya on foot to the tunisian border and by boat to europe, the united nations said on tuesday.
document.title: libyan refugees flee fighting by land and sea
lines_and_colors: fighting between rebels and forces loyal to muammar gaddafi is forcing thousands of refugees to flee western libya on foot to the tunisian border and by boat to europe, the united nations said on tuesday.
